document.full_text: the tunisian army and navy are trying to rescue 700 people trapped in a fishing boat that broke down 20 km (12.4 miles) from the tunisian island of kerkennah, the tunisian state news service tap reported tuesday.
document.title: tunisian army battles to rescue 700 refugees from boat
lines_and_colors: the tunisian army and navy are trying to rescue 700 people trapped in a fishing boat that broke down 20 km (12.4 miles) from the tunisian island of kerkennah, the tunisian state news service tap reported tuesday.
